page.title: 07TIBBERTON SCHOOL GAMES
page.content: {EDUCATION} {PLAYGROUND GAMES}-Children were interviewed about which games they played at playtime.The children tend to play games which involve running around and a few play traditional games such as bulldog(a fast catch game).Ball games are not allowed due to limited space. {TELEVISION INFLUENCE}-A lot of games played were based on T.V. programmes such as the'A-TEAM' or 'KNIGHTRIDER' which are American cops and robbers programmes. {PLAYGROUND FURNITURE}-The wall bars in the playground provided a great number of uses from just climbing on to a S.A.S. assault course or a DRAGON's lair.
